name: ChristmasCountdown
0:
”Alexa, open Christmas Countdown.”
”Alexa, Ask Christmas Countdown how many weeks till Christmas.”
”Alexa, Ask Christmas Countdown how many sleeps until Christmas.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: christmas countdown
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Throughout the year you can ask how many sleeps until Christmas and during the month of December you will get an extra special update from Santa and find out how he is preparing for the big day.

Alexa will tell you how many sleeps, days or weeks until Christmas and then pass you to Santa for an update from the North Pole, followed by asking you a yes or no question about your Christmas preparations.

I hope you enjoy the skill and it gets you in a Christmassy mood.

Merry Christmas!

Hugo.FM

For More Christmas Content check out this Santa Skill:

"Alexa, Open Santa Claus"
